content.rendered: Hey everyone! Just thought I’d share with you a flyer I made for Dagers High. It’s just a short intro to the game that might end up on the box, or somewhere else. Let me know what you think in the comments and subscribe if you enjoy this content!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Adjusting Cards (part two)
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hello everyone! Today I thought I would write a bit about the adjustments I have made recently to the Sophomore deck. These mainly consist of small action point buffs to make Sophomore year a lot less difficult. There is some history to a very difficult Sophomore year: at my high…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Purchase Daggers High on The Game Crafter
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hi everyone! I thought that I would just take a moment to share the new progress I've had with Daggers High. You may be aware that Daggers High recently launched and failed on Kickstarter. Although this was disappointing, I still wanted to find a way to get Daggers High into…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Promotion- Twitch and Westmont Public Library
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone- just thought I'd inform you all that Eric Say will be streaming more graphic design for Daggers High on his Twitch Steam tomorrow (November 10th, Sunday)! Please follow his Twitch stream if you would like to follow along: https://www.twitch.tv/esaygraphics/videos/all The stream will likely take place at 8 AM Central…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Origin of Dagers High
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Dagers High was first thought of back in October of 2017, while I was still in high school. From the start, the idea was to make fun of the college admission process, where students race to build up their resumes without really thinking about what they enjoy or actually learning. I…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Interview with the Friendly Boardgamer
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The Friendly Boardgamer just released an interview featuring me! You can check out the original article here: https://thefriendlyboardgamer.wordpress.com/2019/06/05/jorge-zhang-daggers-highschool/ Here is the article: This interview is with Jorge Zhang who is the designer of Daggers Highschool, a game about bribing your way in to the best University. We also talked about…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Blue Giant previews Daggers High
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! Today, I'd like to share with you a video that Blue Giant Media recently released. They made a gameplay preview of Daggers High that went through Freshman year, and talked about setting up the game.
